29.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
report + Mark an invoice as Modint invoice: client do not exist
report: date from/until are mandatory
report: date until < date from
Mark an invoice as Modint invoice: debtor do not exist
Mark an invoice as Modint invoice: Invoice do not exist
no error was found :

ItemsList.valUnicode: Report,Mark an invoice as Modint invoice

ExpSyntax.val: Trim (StrToken ({0,10},1,','))=Trim ({0,11}) AND (Trim (StrToken ({0,30},1,','))=Trim ({0,31}) OR Trim (StrToken ({0,30},2,','))=Trim ({0,31})) AND (ISNULL ({0,33}) OR ISNULL ({0,34}))
